motivation.title: Motivation
motivation.body: The Skeet framework allows small developer teams to quickly launch apps and maintain them over the long term.

zero-to-deploy.title: Zero to Deploy
zero-to-deploy.body: This is Zero to Deploy. Coming soon.

react-native.title: React Native (Expo)
react-native.body: We're using React Native (Expo) on the frontend. We can use the Tailwind and React technology on mobile dev as well.

ssg-template.title: SSG Template (Next.js)
ssg-template.body: The project needs the website, blog and docs. So we have the starter for that with SSG on Next.js. SEO Ready.
